dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The NeRF synthetic dataset consists of eight objects, each rendered via path tracing to generate 100 views. For testing, an eighth of these images is selected, with the remainder allocated for training.
dcterms:title: NeRF synthetic dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Jensen

dcterms:description: The DTU real-captured dataset is processed for camera poses, with image and mask processing following specific methodologies. It is used for evaluating surface reconstruction quality.
dcterms:title: DTU real-captured dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Knapitsch
J. Park
Q.-Y. Zhou
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The Tanks&Temples (TNT) large-scale dataset is used for benchmarking large-scale scene reconstruction and is processed for camera poses.
dcterms:title: Tanks&Temples (TNT) large-scale dataset
